title: Wonderjam
description: I took up the WonderJam challenge (GameJam organized by UQAC and Ubisoft) with a team of five people, we created a video game in 3 days on an imposed theme.

title: Inter-ISEN
description: I organized and coordinated the Inter-ISEN 2023-2024, an inter-school LAN bringing together the campuses of Lille, Rennes, Brest, Nantes, Caen, Bordeaux, Paris, Marseille and Toulon, managing event design, logistical planning and the smooth running of the tournament.

title: Super U
description: In 2023, I worked as a self-service employee at Super U (July-August), stocking shelves, managing stock and providing customer service.

title: Emmaüs
description: I did an internship with Emmaüs, where I sorted and shelved items, sold them in the store and organized the transport of goods to collection points.

title: Restos du Cœur
description: In 2022, I did an associative internship at Restos du Cœur, taking part in food distribution, outreach programs, and receiving/sorting donations.
